title: Bam Bam Bam Bambaram Lyrics Raja Mandhiri Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Bam Bam Bam Bambaram
konda vachcha bambaram
thambikkitta thoththuputta
variya oru aattam

hey ram bam bam bam
bambaram
konda vachcha bambaram
summaakaachu thoththom
varalaam maruaattam

pongadaa dey
naanga thaana serndha koottam
naanga yaarum vara maattom
vittu thara maattom
idhu yaaru vachcha sattam

chella pullaÂ 
illa tholla
podaa kazhudha
neethaan ellaam

kirukkupayaluga ivanga
oorru usura vaangudhunga
idhunga.

enna adichchaalum
pudichchaalum
sanda vandhu
kadichchaalum
paasaththukku
panjamum illa.
indha anna thambi
oorula illa.

Bam Bam Bam Bambaram
konda vachcha bambaram
indha annan thambi
kadhaya kettaa
suththidum thala unakku.

oor suththum kuruvinga
veettukku thirumba
peththa manasukulla varum
kannula aruvi.

..
